official_title: A bill to repeal the designation of the Rio Grande River, Texas, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Repeals the designation of the Rio Grande River in Texas as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the designation of the Rio Grande River, Texas, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
